document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Ilvastarr Villa on Saerdoun Street.
document_data.name: Ilvastarr Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Ilvastarr Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Ilvastarr]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the east section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. It sat on southeast side of the intersection where [[Suldown Street]] met [[Saerdoun Street]]. A small portion of the west side of the villa abutted [[Nindabar Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained five buildings arranged around a central garden. The buildings were two and three storys tall.
